segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and it’s actually kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to realize what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, but I can’t help but laugh at the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like a circus act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is the smart one—she’s just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how oblivious the woman is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the floor, but at least it’s entertaining.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone gets a video of this—it’s too good to miss.
segments.speaker: PAR
